1.weather_description: Tropical monsoon climate. Hot and humid with a wet season from April to October and a dry season from November to March.

2.weather_description: Mediterranean climate. Mild, wet winters and hot, dry summers.

3.weather_description: Varied climate. Generally temperate in the north and west, but mild winters and hot summers in the Mediterranean south.

4.weather_description: Varies from temperate in Alaska to tropical in Hawaii. Continental climate in the interior.

5.weather_description: Tropical climate. Warm and humid all year round with distinct wet and dry seasons.

6.weather_description: Mediterranean climate. Mild winters and hot summers.

7.weather_description: Tropical climate. Hot and humid with a rainy season from November to March.

8.weather_description: Tropical climate. Warm temperatures year-round with high humidity.

9.weather_description: Varies from temperate in the north to subtropical in the south. Hot and humid summers.

10.weather_description: Tropical climate along the coast, temperate inland. Rainy season from May to November.

11.weather_description: Mediterranean climate. Mild, wet winters and hot, dry summers.

12.weather_description: Varied climate. Cool in the north, moderate in the south. Cold winters in the interior.

13.weather_description: Varies from temperate in the south to subtropical in the north. Mild winters and warm summers.

14.weather_description: Varied climate. Warm summers and cool winters in the north, mild temperatures year-round in the south.

15.weather_description: Mediterranean climate. Mild winters and hot summers.

16.weather_description: Tropical marine climate. Warm and humid year-round.

17.weather_description: Varies from temperate in Alaska to tropical in Hawaii. Continental climate in the interior.

18.weather_description: Varied climate. Mediterranean along the coast and continental inland. Hot summers and mild winters.

19.weather_description: Varies from temperate in Alaska to tropical in Hawaii. Continental climate in the interior.

20.weather_description: Desert climate. Hot summers and warm winters.

21.weather_description: Varied climate. Temperate in the south, subtropical in the north. Mild winters and warm summers.

22.weather_description: Varied climate. Continental in the east and alpine in the west. Warm summers and cold winters.

23.weather_description: Tropical climate. Hot and humid with a monsoon season from May to October.

24.weather_description: Subarctic climate. Cool summers and cold winters.

25.weather_description: Mediterranean climate. Mild winters and hot summers.

26.weather_description: Varies from temperate in the north to Mediterranean in the south. Hot summers and mild winters.

27.weather_description: Varied climate. Coastal areas are hot and humid, while the interior is cooler. Rainy season from November to April.

28.weather_description: Varied climate. Desert in the north, Mediterranean along the coast, and temperate in the south. Dry summers and wet winters.

29.weather_description: Varied climate. Coastal regions are temperate, while inland areas are colder. Rainy season from October to April.
